script.title: provision-vcpe-profile.slax
script.author: phil.shafer
script.synopsis: Adds a Virtual CPE (VCPE) customer address
script.description: This "op" script generates configuration data for VCPE nodes. There are two parts to the generated config. In the first part, the requested parameters are recorded in the config group "vcpe". These allow the script to audit the config to find errors or update the config later, as well as allowing the user to see the high-level view of what the desire outcome is. New versions of the script can use this information to regenerate the configuration as the script evolves.
